stimulusHtml:
This question is based on one or two slides. For a question involving two slides, when you are not asked specifically to name the artists and/or titles of the works, you may refer to the work on the left as (L) and the work on the right as (R).

A response that answers the question directly will receive a higher score than one that simply lists characteristics or includes irrelevant points. Take a moment to read the question carefully before formulating your answer.

Both buildings are from the same art historical period.Name the period. Account for the differences in the interiors of these buildings.

features.html:
LEFT

RIGHT
